email.subject: RE:RE:To #PLAYERNAME#
email.body:
Excellent work. I'm pretty certain I can invite you to my group's IRC now- where we do projects and stuff. You've earned my trust, albeit semi-reluctantly. I'm going to keep an eye on you, so don't try anything funny.
I've linked to our IRC Channel below. I'll get you a link to our Asset and Drop server soon, too.
Thanks for your help. -Zaz
